definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: The wrinkled silk will flatten out if you iron it.
sentences.chinese: 發皺的絲綢可以用熨斗燙平。

sentences.english: Hair drier and electric iron is popular in our life.
sentences.chinese: 吹風機與電熨斗已經成爲普及的居家電器。

sentences.english: The first item she bought was an electric iron.
sentences.chinese: 她買的第一樣東西是電熨斗。

sentences.english: This electric iron features automatic temperature regulation.
sentences.chinese: 這種電熨斗的特點是能自動調節溫度。

sentences.english: We ironed our best uniforms, sharing one electric iron.
sentences.chinese: 我們共用一個電熨斗，熨好了我們最好的制服。

sentences.english: We often use an electric smoothing iron to make the clothes smooth.
sentences.chinese: 我們經常用電熨斗熨平衣服。

sentences.english: He looks flat-footed and he can not repair the broken flat iron well.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來笨手笨腳哦，他無法把這個壞了的熨斗修好。

sentences.english: Paths just outside the hotel's doors lead up into the scenic Flatiron Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 就在酒店的門路徑導致到熨斗山景區。

sentences.english: You can use a common electric iron used for pressing clothes .
sentences.chinese: 你可以用一些常用的燙衣服的電熨斗。

sentences.english: Hairdryers and irons are available on request from reception.
sentences.chinese: 接待處可以應您的要求提供吹風機和熨斗。

sentences.english: She smoothed the creases out with an electric iron .
sentences.chinese: 她用電熨斗把皺褶燙平。

sentences.english: The iron hissed as it pressed the wet cloth.
sentences.chinese: 熨斗壓在溼布上時發出嘶嘶聲。

sentences.english: The heat of these irons was different from that used by housewives.
sentences.chinese: 這些熨斗跟家庭主婦們的熨牛大不相同。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an electric iron and related steam generating device.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了熨斗及其蒸汽產生裝置。

sentences.english: She bought an electric iron in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 她在商店買了一個電熨斗。

sentences.english: Do you know where I can buy an iron?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我能在哪兒買到電熨斗嗎？
